K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-1: pra dzny'a pa ra dh'a ni n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-3: shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-5: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-8: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-11: pra dzny'a pa ra dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-13: me dha pa ra dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-15: buddhi pa ra dha ni sv'ah'a; rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-17: nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-051:327a-19: shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
